CLAUSE 1: I
Risk Level: medium Word Count: 54
n addition to the duty to indemnify and hold the County harmless
against any and all liability, claim, demand or suit resulting from
Borrower, its agents, employee’s or subcontractor’s performance of this Contract, Borrower shall defend the County at its sole cost and
expense with counsel approved by Board of Supervisors against
plain_english: This liability requires compliance with specific requirements.
user_impact: You must follow these medium-risk requirements or face consequences.
